title: LF Team Manager - OOL / OCS
body:
Just writing on behalf of the team I am involved with. We are currently in the process of organising ourselves for the 2016 season, beginning after Christmas. If you are someone wanting to be involved and manage a high level challenger team then add me in game "ecotoxic" as long as the following requirements are met. 

* Understands how open ladder and challenger series works
* Has previous experience in organising or managerial roles
* Knows of other teams at the oceanic challenger level
* Knows how to organise scrims 
* Has available time to dedicate to this
* (All could think of necessary atm)

For further information leave question here or talk to me in game.
